transcend.4_1:

transcend.6:

SKT_FIRST.name: Blade Dance
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and when it is the caster's turn, obtains <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>Natural Talent (Unique Resource)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy, and when it is the caster's turn, obtains <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000087_1_1]</color> <color=#28d9ed>Natural Talent (Unique Resource)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Pulse, Release!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and when it is the caster's turn, obtains <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>Natural Talent (Unique Resource)</color>.\n\nThis skill ignores the Defense of <color=#28d9ed>Water</color> or <color=#28d9ed>Healer</color> enemies by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases damage\nReduces cooldown of Pulse, Release! by 2 turns

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Skill\nExpands attack range\nResets skill cooldown of Faster than Bullets!

description: Attacks an enemy, and when it is the caster's turn, obtains <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000087_2_1]</color> <color=#28d9ed>Natural Talent (Unique Resource)</color>.\n\nThis skill ignores the Defense of <color=#28d9ed>Water</color> or <color=#28d9ed>Healer</color> enemies by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Faster than Bullets!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\n<color=#28d9ed>Water</color> or <color=#28d9ed>Healer</color> enemies killed by this skill cannot be Resurrected or Revived.\nIf the caster has <color=#28d9ed>5</color> <color=#28d9ed>Natural Talent (Unique Resource)</color>, consumes all to <color=#28d9ed>fully</color> recover skill cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Faster than Bullets!</color> and ignores the target's Defense by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy.\n<color=#28d9ed>Water</color> or <color=#28d9ed>Healer</color> enemies killed by this skill cannot be Resurrected or Revived.\nIf the caster has <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000087_3_1]</color> <color=#28d9ed>Natural Talent (Unique Resource)</color>, consumes all to <color=#28d9ed>fully</color> recover skill cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Faster than Bullets!</color> and ignores the target's Defense by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, reduces skill cooldowns of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Recovers Action Points of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>15</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: After attacking, reduces skill cooldowns of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000042_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Recovers Action Points of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000065_backup_1_1]</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
